languages.text: "Возложите на себя оковы презрения и нетерпимости ко злу, и они оберегут вас, словно крепкая броня".
"Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."
languages.original_text: "Возложите на себя оковы презрения и нетерпимости ко злу, и они оберегут вас, словно крепкая броня".

"Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."

languages.text: 「あらゆる邪悪なものに対する軽蔑と不寛容の鎧を身にまとえ。この鎧があなたを守ってくれる」
languages.original_text: "Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる邪悪なものに対する軽蔑と不寛容の鎧を身にまとえ。この鎧があなたを守ってくれる」

languages.text: “愿你们对邪恶的愤怒与蔑视，成为你们无坚不摧的盔甲。愿这神圣的盔甲守护你们。”
languages.original_text: "Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."

traits.locale_text: “愿你们对邪恶的愤怒与蔑视，成为你们无坚不摧的盔甲。愿这神圣的盔甲守护你们。”

languages.text: «Revístanse con la armadura del desprecio y la intolerancia hacia todo lo perverso. Que esa armadura les proteja».
languages.original_text: "Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."

traits.locale_text: «Revístanse con la armadura del desprecio y la intolerancia hacia todo lo perverso. Que esa armadura les proteja».

languages.text: "Kleidet Euch in die Rüstung der Verachtung und Intoleranz allen bösen Dingen gegenüber. Diese Rüstung soll Euch beschützen."
languages.original_text: "Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."

traits.locale_text: "Kleidet Euch in die Rüstung der Verachtung und Intoleranz allen bösen Dingen gegenüber. Diese Rüstung soll Euch beschützen."

languages.text: « Revêtez une armure de mépris et d'intolérance pour vous protéger du mal. »
languages.original_text: "Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."

traits.locale_text: « Revêtez une armure de mépris et d'intolérance pour vous protéger du mal. »

languages.text: "Fena her şeyden uzak durun ve tahammülünüzü sakının. Bu zırha sığınıp kendinizi koruyun."
languages.original_text: "Clad yourselves in the armour of contempt and intolerance for all things wicked. Let this armour protect you."

traits.locale_text: "Fena her şeyden uzak durun ve tahammülünüzü sakının. Bu zırha sığınıp kendinizi koruyun."
